title: Publish DRSJC Studios GDR to Production

requirements.summary: Publish the current draft deployment to production at https://drsjc-studios-gdr.caffeine.xyz/
acceptanceCriteria: The current draft version is promoted to production.
The production URL https://drsjc-studios-gdr.caffeine.xyz/ serves the latest published build.
All frontend assets and backend canisters are live and accessible.

file_operations.description: Update the smoke test checklist to reference the production URL https://drsjc-studios-gdr.caffeine.xyz/ for post-deployment verification. Ensure all test steps reflect the production environment rather than draft deployment URLs.
